greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of minimal edge covers in the grid graph P_n X P_n.
comment: A minimal edge cover is an edge cover such that the removal of any edge in the cover destroys the covering property. Equivalently, these are the edge covers whose connected components are stars.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Grid Graph
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Minimal Edge Cover
example: In the 3 X 3 grid, the minimal edge covers up to rotation and reflection are:
The first two of these need to be counted 2 and 4 times and the rest which have no symmetry 8 times so a(3) = 38.
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Jun 04 2017
